name: IronClaw Handoff Response
description: Responds to code quality and dependency findings routed from other agents via Discussion handoffs. Performs code analysis and posts results back.
process: Receive finding context from triggering handoff
Fetch the target file or component referenced in the finding
Analyze code quality issues or dependency problems
Propose remediation if the finding is fixable
Reply to the originating Discussion with analysis and rj-meta response block
Update Discussion labels with resolution status

metrics.successCriteria: Handoff findings analyzed and responded to
